body_content.explanation: in cricket, the average number of runs scored by a batsman in each innings:
examples: He finishes the one-day series with the highest batting average of his team.
In test matches at home, their top batsman has a batting average of 60.

body_content.explanation: in baseball, the average number of hits by a batter each time he or she is at bat :
examples: In the past, batting average, home runs, and RBI were the only statistics most fans cared about.
He has a batting average of .305 with 27 home runs this season.
